item.title: Twitter's Source code is now OpenSource
item.description: As promised by Elon, Part of Twiter's code is now Open Source. Twitter is now the Linux of Social Media.

item.title: How NeuraLink is Taking Mind Control to the Next Level
item.description: Neural link is a Neural Technology company that develops implantable computer chips, first founded by Elon Musk in 2016
